entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
